divs: Sighting DetailsAria: Near Downtown Oshawa. The light looked bigger than Saturn and it was coming from the West. I went to my parents house then came back to see that it was still there 15 degrees from the hurizen. I went in the house and walked out with the camera without putting my coat on. I was shaking because I was getting cold and I couln't take a good "still" still. I was afraid I was going to loose it. The camera I was had options for taking different kinds of pictures but I couldn't get a picture of what I was seeing. I did however took some typical UFO pictures of this object in the sky but honestly it wasn't what I saw. The video clip I took was closest to what I saw.
Summary: I saw many UFO's before but this one was so slow I had time to get a camera
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Oshawa
There were no other sightings in Oshawa on or around February 10th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
